column4: I'm having a trouble with all instant messengers.. I tried amsn, pigin, emesene, kopete... None of them are working when I try to connect in MSN.. The loading when connecting always stop in some point...any tips?
check if msn is runing at the moment
this command just recognize my 2 HDs
dmesg is showing the drive when pluged in?
I also got "[ 1590.530274] sd 5:0:0:0: [sdc] READ CAPACITY failed"
ah ok didnt read the failed
I tried "sudo mkdir -p /mnt/pendrive && sudo mount /dev/sdc1 /mnt/pendrive", but I have to specify the file system..
where I put the "ntfs" in the command?
I tried "sudo mkdir -p /mnt/pendrive && sudo mount /dev/sdc1 /mnt/pendrive", but I have to specify the file system..
